trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a resource reference key cannot be found during parsing or serialization of markup extension resources.
trans-unit.target: 在分析或序列化标记扩展资源期间找不到资源引用键时引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceReferenceKeyNotFoundException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceReferenceKeyNotFoundException"></xref> class with the specified serialization information and streaming context.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.ResourceReferenceKeyNotFoundException"></xref>使用指定的序列化信息和流上下文的类。

trans-unit.source: Specific information from the serialization process.
trans-unit.target: 序列化过程中的特定信息。

trans-unit.source: The context at the time the exception was thrown.
trans-unit.target: 在引发异常时处的上下文。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceReferenceKeyNotFoundException"></xref> class with the specified error message and resource key.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.ResourceReferenceKeyNotFoundException"></xref>类与指定的错误消息和资源键。

trans-unit.source: The key that was not found.
Reports specifics of the exception to debuggers or dialogs.
trans-unit.target: 向调试器或对话框中报告异常的具体的信息。

trans-unit.source: Specific information from the serialization process.
trans-unit.target: 序列化过程中的特定信息。

trans-unit.source: The context at the time the exception was thrown.
trans-unit.target: 在引发异常时处的上下文。

trans-unit.source: Gets the key that was not found and caused the exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 获取未找到并导致引发异常的密钥。
